Class AuthDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.AuthDAO
public class AuthDAO extends Object
Data access object for auth tokens.

  • Method Details

    • getToken

      public models.AuthToken getToken (models.User user) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Return a token for a given user
      Parameters:
      user - The user to find the token for
      Returns:
      the authentication token of the user or null if one does not exist for the given user
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if database is inaccessible

    • getTokens

      public models.AuthToken[] getTokens() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Return a list of all the authentication tokens in the database
      Returns:
      an array of tokens
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if database is inaccessible

    • insertToken

      public void insertToken (models.AuthToken authToken) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Inserts a given token into the database
      Parameters:
      authToken - The token to insert
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if database is inaccessible

    • updateToken

      public void updateToken (models.User user, models.AuthToken authToken) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Update the token for a given user to the given token
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose token will be updated
      authToken - The new token to replace the old one
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if the user does not have a token to update

    • removeToken

      public void removeToken (models.AuthToken authToken) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Remove the given authentication token from the database
      Parameters:
      authToken - The token to be removed
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if the token cannot be found

    • clearTokens

      public void clearTokens() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Clear all tokens from the database
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if database is inaccessible
